channel.title: Metal Music Windows Itunes on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Metal Music Windows Itunes on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: itunes... heh
item.description: so itunes came out for windows today. it is awesome. well sorta. it was a pain in the ass importing music and such. It is awesome to buy music however. I don’t think I will ever buy another CD. it rules so much. too bad there isn’t more metal. sad day. they need a LOT more metal.. one thing that is awesome.. is I found my friends band on there. heh.
